1210960 1213900 I, uh, I think I'm dreaming about her.

1586940 1588720 I know you don't like to talk about her.

1632544 1634140 maybe, maybe I can

1640280 1642116 Look, I just don't want to talk about this

1646180 1653680 Look, Steffi, after our father died,

1654760 1656620 She, she wouldn't let us go to school.

1699840 1702900 That woman is a sick and dangerous person.

1738140 1741120 And not only that, I feel like,

1741500 1743400 Please, you are the only person who can

1743740 1746180 Howard would never forgive me if I put you

2045845 2048040 She, uh, she left when I was 10.
2048120 2050540 So we don't, we don't see her anymore.

2059795 2064920 No, um, I'm actually here because I've

2066620 2069320 Yeah, yeah, every single night for the

2072140 2074380 You're, you're on a date, but

2074381 2079340 and, and then there's an
explosion and then you-Fall and die.

2088220 2091880 Years ago, at the sky view, I got a

2092960 2094840 And saw what death was about to do.

2115660 2117700 And that's all because of you.

2181940 2183540 Lives that were never meant to be saved.

2220060 2221600 He's a relentless son of a bitch.
2222500 2224220 Won't stop till he finishes the job.
2224360 2226640 But I taught myself how to see him coming.
2229780 2232280 Been keeping him at bay for years now.

2311670 2313530 I have to get back to school.

2317450 2318810 I won't be alive that long.
2322190 2324190 Death is coming for our family.
2330050 2333050 I think I made a mistake.
2333550 2336110 I think it was probably just a dream.

2412720 2414216 Her face really exploded right in front of

2430300 2432200 I never should have went there.

2491440 2492960 You think she'll come to the barbecue?

2504570 2505890 You don't remember her like I do.

2523220 2524760 No, what's that supposed to mean?

2694240 2695340 Oh my God, Bob is allergic.

2729073 2732050 enjoy life and spend the

3184570 3186310 No, it has everything to do with us.

3190270 3191790 these people went on to have families.

3264591 3267250 Hey, Brenda, please just leave it alone.

3277950 3279190 Let me take care of this.
3290420 3291910 But sometimes I really hate you.

3324130 3326870 Don't let my mom's beliefs derail your

3362430 3363430 I need you to lock up.

3371470 3372690 I hope you burn in hell.

3391911 3395950 Like and subscribe and all the things.

3729660 3730140 What do you want me to do?

3737530 3739740 Maybe death's not actually coming for our

3740300 3742100 Because that would be fucking crazy.

3772170 3773370 And stay away from these kids.

3841670 3842790 I'm just trying to help you.

3851189 3853171 shit about your stupid

3853350 3857010 So take a hint and leave us alone,

4016830 4017970 I got you out of it.

4069000 4070041 You got to help me, Steph.

4074620 4078920 I mean, I thought I did,

4080570 4082980 I mean, you predicted exactly what was

4092380 4094520 The trimmer, the blower, the soccer ball.

4095475 4098053 It was like they were

4098093 4099880 just had to put them together,

4100780 4103860 Darling, please do not encourage this.

4112955 4117300 Stephanie, if you can see how all of this

4146810 4150146 Our family is clearly going to

4167860 4173040 It says that, um, right here, J.B.

4177760 4179320 was or-Wait a minute, I know that name.

4200660 4201840 Shit, it's like an hour away.

4347664 4350221 but it's okay, not everyone

4354660 4356020 That I didn't want to be your mom?

4365340 4368400 I thought I could put it behind me,

4368820 4373040 all I could see were a hundred different

4374240 4375720 I didn't want you to leave the house.

4391400 4393320 I have no idea if I did the right thing.

4437650 4438870 The front desk is this way.

4469320 4471200 But my friends call me JB.

4488850 4490430 I was sorry to hear about Iris.

4515310 4519130 I wasn't supposed to be there,

4548450 4551383 So, all that time, she

4551384 4554561 our family, she was

4604443 4608800 Corman found herself on

4614480 4616340 But her doctor managed to bring her back.
